title: Don’t Treat Me Like a Kid!
detail_text: <:th_ch0212/>Ugh...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>You seem to be in a bad mood. What happened?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Kasumi and the others treated me like a kid. I’m a college student in the States and a third-year student here! It’s just rude.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>That’s...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>What? Are you going to treat me like a kid, too, Umi?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>N-no, I’m not. I know you’re responsible, Mia.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Huh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Unlike Hono... I mean, some people forget their homework and let their grades slip when they’re having fun. You don’t, Mia. You have a solid routine, and it’s quite impressive. Not everyone can do that, you know.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>W-well, yeah! Not everyone can do it! Ha, I feel kinda silly worrying about this now. Hey Umi, let’s go grab some hamburgers!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>That’s not a good idea. If you eat something like that as a snack, you won’t have room for dinner.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Stop treating me like a kid!!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
